sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { }

Product Cart

{{ product.name }}

Category: {{ product.category }}

{{ product.description }}

Price: {{ product.price |currency:'INR' }}

Discount Price: {{ product.discountPrice|currency:'INR' }}

{{ product.quantity }}

Total Price: ${{ calculateTotal() }}
